pages.index: ArtSupply - Online Art Supplies Store in India About us Our team Gallery Contact Us +91-845-8124167 artsupply@gmail.com Welcome to ArtSupply: Your Ultimate Destination for Art Materials At ArtSupply, we provide a comprehensive range of high-quality art supplies to help you unleash your creativity. From premium paints and brushes to canvases and sketchbooks, we have everything an artist needs. Whether you are a professional artist or a beginner, our products are designed to meet your artistic demands. Explore our extensive collection and discover the perfect materials to bring your visions to life. Our commitment to quality ensures that you receive only the best products, making your artistic process smoother and more enjoyable. Join our community of artists and let your creativity flourish with ArtSupply. About ArtSupply ArtSupply is a leading provider of art materials based in India, established in 2015. We are passionate about supporting artists of all levels by offering a wide range of high-quality products to fuel their creativity. Our mission is to inspire and empower artists worldwide. We strive to provide exceptional customer service and unparalleled product quality. With a dedication to innovation and excellence, we continually expand our product offerings to meet the evolving needs of the artistic community. Our journey began with a vision to create a one-stop destination for artists to find everything they need to bring their imagination to life. Over the years, we have built a reputation for reliability and excellence, earning the trust of artists around the globe. At ArtSupply, we believe that art has the power to transform lives and bring people together. That's why we are committed to fostering creativity and providing resources to help artists thrive in their craft. Join us on our mission to unleash the creative potential within every artist. Whether you're a seasoned professional or just starting your artistic journey, ArtSupply is here to support you every step of the way. Discover More Explore our wide range of art supplies at ArtSupply. From paints and brushes to sketchbooks and easels, we have everything you need to bring your creative visions to life. Our products are carefully curated to meet the diverse needs of artists, whether you're a professional painter, illustrator, or hobbyist. With top-quality materials and innovative tools, you can unleash your creativity and take your art to new heights. Meet Our Team At ArtSupply, our team is comprised of passionate individuals who share a common dedication to supporting artists worldwide. With their expertise and commitment, they ensure that our customers receive the best products and service possible. Each member of our team brings unique skills and perspectives to the table, allowing us to continually innovate and improve. Whether it's our CEO providing strategic direction or our customer support specialists assisting with inquiries, every team member plays a vital role in our mission to empower artists and foster creativity. Ravi Patel CEO Vikram Singh Marketing Manager Arun Sharma Creative Director Rajesh Gupta Customer Support Specialist Discover the Advantages of ArtSupply Wide Range of Products At ArtSupply, we offer a diverse selection of art materials to cater to every artist's needs. From paints and brushes to drawing tools and accessories, we have everything you need to unleash your creativity. Exceptional Quality We are committed to providing top-quality products that meet the highest standards. Our materials are carefully curated to ensure durability, performance, and satisfaction for our customers. Outstanding Customer Service Customer satisfaction is our priority. Our dedicated team is here to assist you with any questions or concerns, ensuring a seamless shopping experience from start to finish. Contact us I accept Privacy policy E-mail artsupply@gmail.com Address Magadi Main Rd, next to Prasanna Theatre, Cholourpalya, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560023, India Phone +91-845-8124167 Home Privacy policy Terms of Use Discover endless bliss in every sip
pages.privacy: ArtSupply - Privacy Policy About us Our team Gallery Contact Us +91-845-8124167 artsupply@gmail.com Privacy Policy At ArtSupply, we respect and protect the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy outlines how we handle your personal information to safeguard your privacy. Please read this policy carefully to understand our views and practices regarding your personal data and how we will treat it. 1. Information We Collect We may collect and process the following data about you: Personal identification information such as name, email address, phone number, etc. Details of your visits to our website and the resources you access. Information you provide by filling in forms on our site, such as registration or order forms. 2. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect in the following ways: To provide you with information, products, or services that you request from us. To ensure that content from our site is presented in the most effective manner for you and your device. To carry out our obligations arising from any contracts entered into between you and us. To notify you about changes to our service. 3. Sharing Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. 4. Security of Your Information We are committed to ensuring that your information is secure. In order to prevent unauthorized access or disclosure, we have put in place suitable physical, electronic, and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online. 5. Your Data Protection Rights You have the following data protection rights: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions. The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions. The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions. The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions. If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at our email: artsupply@gmail.com. 6. Changes to Our Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. 7. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us by email at artsupply@gmail.com. Home Privacy policy Terms of Use Discover endless bliss in every sip
pages.terms: ArtSupply - Terms of Use About us Our team Gallery Contact Us +91-845-8124167 artsupply@gmail.com Terms of Service Welcome to ArtSupply!
